Ideographic: A metal 釒 weapon 殺

鎩字的基本解释

鎩
shā
见“铩”。

鎩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shā］
［《廣韻》所八切，入黠，生。］
［《廣韻》所例切，去祭，生。］
［《廣韻》所拜切，去怪，生。］
“铩1”的繁体字。
(1)长刃刀矛之属。一说鈹有鐔。
(2)泛指兵仗。
(3)犹剪除（鸟羽）；伤残。

鎩字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鎩； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1318第08
【唐韻】所拜切【集韻】【韻會】所戒切，?殺去聲。【說文】鈹有鐔也。【韻會】一曰長矛。【賈誼·過秦論】非銛於句戟長鎩也。【釋文】鎩，所拜反。【漢書註】音山列反。【集韻】或作?。亦作?。【韻會】或作?。　又【廣韻】剪翮。【左思·蜀都賦】鳥鎩翮。【註】鎩，殘也。【顏延年·五君詠】鸞翮有時鎩，龍性誰能馴。　又【廣韻】所八切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】山戛切，?音殺。又【韻會】式列切，音設。義?同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?所例切，音㡜。戟屬。　又【集韻】色入切，音歰。鋋也。本作闟。　又叶式吏切，音試。【張衡·東京賦】郞將司階，虎戟交鎩。龍輅充庭，雲旗拂霓。霓去聲。

spear
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shā]
[The eight cuts in "Guangyun", enter the key, and are born. ]
["Guangyun" cut, go to sacrifice, and give birth. ]
["Guangyun" worships cut, go to blame, and give birth. ]
"铩1" in traditional characters.
(1) Belonging to the long-blade spear. One said that beryllium has cymbals.
(2) Refers to military battles in general.
(3) Still cut off (bird feather); disabled.
spear
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　铩; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 1318-08
[Tang Yun] cut by worship [Jiyun] [yunhui] cut by the ban, kill it. [Said the text] Beryllium also has cymbals. [Rhyme Club] One is the spear. [Jia Yi·Guo Qin Lun] It is not as if it is just like Juji. 【Explanation】Choose, rebel. [Han Shu Annotation] Yinshan listed in reverse. [Ji Yun] Or make?. Also for?. [Rhyme Club] Or make?.　[Guang Yun] Cut the crust. 【Zuo Si·Shu Du Fu】The bird cock. [Note] Disabled, remnant. [Yan Yannian·Yong of the Five Monarchs] Luan Hei is sometimes bad, but who can tame the dragon.　 [Guang Yun] So eight cuts [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Shan Jia cut,? Sound kill. Also 【Rhyme Meeting】style list cut, sound setting. Righteous? Same.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Cut the case, sound 㡜. Halberd.　[Jiyun] The color is cut, the sound is 歰.鋋 also. This is for Yun.　Foliate staff cut again, sound test. 【Zhang Heng·Tokyo Fu】The generals of Yan are in order, and the tigers and halberds are fighting. The dragon ring fills the court, and the clouds and flags flutter. Ni goes.
